result.eng: The aerplane suddenly landed on the ground.
result.ga: thuirling an t-eitleán ar thalamh de phlimp
result.orig: Thuirling an t-eitleán ar thalamh de phlimp
result.html: thuirling an t-eitleán ar thalamh de phlimpThe aerplane suddenly landed on the ground.
result.ponchtml: ṫuirling an t-eitleán ar ṫalaṁ de ṗlimpThe aerplane suddenly landed on the ground.

result.html: thuirling an t-eitleán go déanachThe aerplane landed late.
result.ponchtml: ṫuirling an t-eitleán go déanaċThe aerplane landed late.

result.ga: tá an t-eitleán ag tuirlingt
result.html: tá an t-eitleán ag tuirlingtThe aircraft is landing.
result.ponchtml: tá an t-eitleán ag tuirlingtThe aircraft is landing.

result.eng: Some airplane just fell from the sky.
result.ga: tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéir
result.orig: Tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéir
result.html: tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéirSome airplane just fell from the sky.
result.ponchtml: tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéirSome airplane just fell from the sky.

result.eng: What time does the airplane leave?
result.ga: cén t-am a n-imeoidh an t-eitleán
result.orig: Cén t-am a n-imeoidh an t-eitleán
result.html: cén t-am a n-imeoidh an t-eitleánWhat time does the airplane leave?
result.ponchtml: cén t-am a n-imeoiḋ an t-eitleánWhat time does the airplane leave?

result.eng: The pilot was hit in the head but the airplane landed safely.
result.ga: buaileadh an píolóta sa chloigeann ach thuirling an t-eitleán slán sábhailte
result.orig: Buaileadh an píolóta sa chloigeann ach thuirling an t-eitleán slán sábhailte
result.html: buaileadh an píolóta sa chloigeann ach thuirling an t-eitleán slán sábhailteThe pilot was hit in the head but the airplane landed safely.
result.ponchtml: buaileaḋ an píolóta sa ċloigeann aċ ṫuirling an t-eitleán slán sáḃailteThe pilot was hit in the head but the airplane landed safely.

result.eng: There were only three people on board the airplane.
result.ga: ní raibh ach triúr ar bord an eitleáin
result.orig: Ní raibh ach triúr ar bord an eitleáin
result.html: ní raibh ach triúr ar bord an eitleáinThere were only three people on board the airplane.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ aċ triúr ar bord an eitleáinThere were only three people on board the airplane.

result.eng: They left the airplane and went inside the other one.
result.ga: d'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eile
result.orig: D'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eile
result.html: d'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eileThey left the airplane and went inside the other one.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág siad an t-eitleán agus ċuaiġ isteaċ sa ċeann eileThey left the airplane and went inside the other one.

result.eng: The airplanes went back to America.
result.ga: chuaigh na heitleáin ar ais go meiriceá
result.orig: Chuaigh na heitleáin ar ais go Meiriceá
result.html: chuaigh na heitleáin ar ais go meiriceáThe airplanes went back to America.
result.ponchtml: ċuaiġ na heitleáin ar ais go meiriceáThe airplanes went back to America.

result.eng: They were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ga: bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i nua-eabhrac
result.orig: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i nua-eabhracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ponchtml: ḃíoṫas ag fógairt go raiḃ eitleán tar éis doċar a ḋéanaṁ d'ḟoirgneaṁ i nua-eaḃracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.

result.eng: One [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.
result.ga: shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama é
result.orig: Shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama é
result.html: shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama éOne [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.
result.ponchtml: ẛíl láiṫreoir aṁáin naċ raiḃ eitleán ar biṫ i gceist agus go mba ḃuama éOne [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.

result.eng: An airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ga: ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.orig: Ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.html: ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadhAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ponchtml: ní ḟéadfaḋ eitleán dul an bealaċ ar fad tríd an ḃfoirgneaṁ an ḃféadfaḋAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?

result.eng: It seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.
result.ga: ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúnda
result.orig: Ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha Mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúnda
result.html: ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúndaIt seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.
result.ponchtml: ba ċosúil go raiḃ níos mó eitleáin i spéarṫa ṁeiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúndaIt seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.

result.eng: I told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ga: dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.orig: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.html: dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ponchtml: dúirt mé le mo ċoṁarsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aġaiḋ go dtí mo ċeann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
